WorkItem.Description:
Dear,
 
The annexed application demonstrates that drag/drop of columns combined with scrolling while in edit mode may result in improper grid layout
 
Thank you,
 
Julie
 
Procedure
------------
Unzip annexed file
Start Visual Studio 2008 and adjust the reference to 'WPFToolkit.dll' (I used v3.5.40128.1) in the solution project
 
Scenario
----------
The scenario is illustrated in the annexed Excel file
 
End
WorkItem.Summary: DataGrid: scrambled layout when column drag (and vertical scroll) while editing

Comments.Message: File " 11 scroll while edit.zip " contains the scenario where columns are not moved. In this simplified scenario, a mere vertical scroll during edit scrambles the layout

We have verified this and have filed an internal bug in our database.

Thanks for the bug report.

Julie
